attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition serves to underscore that the Zimbabwean crisis cannot end, unless there is foreign intervention.  It is up to us the public to petition the World leaders to intervene, as they did in Iraq, before another Rwanda takes place.  The dictatorial practices of Robert Mugabe continues unabated and this should be the time to put a stop to it.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
